item.description: Open Collective is: a legal and financial toolbox for grassroots groups. Itâ€™s a fundraising + legal status + money management platform for your community.

item.title: Using Luma to Run Events
item.description: Luma is a simple event organizing and registration tool. We use it for events, as well as to manage the collaborative [[calendar|DWeb YVR Calendar]].
